com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMComment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IBMECMBaseObject>, IBMECMBaseObject, IBMECMSocialItem, Serializable

    public interface IBMECMComment
extends IBMECMSocialItem
    Represents a single comment that is associated with a content item.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getComment()
      Returns the comment text.
      void remove(IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete)
      Removes this comment associated with a content item.
      void save(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMComment> onComplete)
      Saves this comment for a content item.
      void setComment(String comment)
      Sets the comment text.

        void remove(IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete)
        Removes this comment associated with a content item.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns true if the comment is removed
